Constructor Detail

ClientProcessor

public ClientProcessor()
Creates a new client processor.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Runs the client processing loop. Specifically, continuously goes through a loop of all the communicators, reads them if input is available, and processes them. Stops when no connections are left.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable

processMessage

private void processMessage(ClientCommunicator cc,
                            Message message)
Respond to a message. These are the responses bound to each packet: requestLogin requestPassword login If password is correct, loginSuccess, otherwise loginFailure and requestPassword status Nothing, but updates the server GUI sendTest Grades the test then sends receiveScore exit exit
Server Receives Server Sends

Parameters:
cc - the communicator
message - the message input

sendTest

void sendTest()
Triggered by the distribution button. Sends tests to all clients.
